title: Further changes at the software.
message:
Further changes at the software.

Added a vibration feature. Added a "keep screen on" flag. Added a
feature to see the enteres penalties.

title: Changes at the App after first big test.
message:
Changes at the App after first big test.

After testing the software system at the middle-German kanoe
championship, many improvements were made. An app-crashing Bug was
fixed. The GUI color was changed to make it easier to read. The
possibility to start or stopp the next or last starter as well as the
current was added to make it easier to start or stopp a close group.
Vertical spaces were added. Also, a software-based "back" button was
added. Finally, minor problems were fixed.

title: New features and bugfixes.
message:
New features and bugfixes.

Added a button "sunk" to mark a kayak that won't reach the target line.
Added a function to show the current penalties of a starter. Added a
fetaure to auto-select the next starter after one was started or
stopped.

title: Updated time synchronisation, added a daemon.
message:
Updated time synchronisation, added a daemon.

Time synchronisation was fixed in a way that it runs with every
imaginable input from the PHP Timestamps. Furthermore, a background
thread was added that retries failed requests, e.g. start times or
penalties.

title: Fixed time synchronization.
message:
Fixed time synchronization.

Corrected a bug related to wrong conversion from PHP to Java timestamp.
Also considered connection time to calculation of time difference.

title: Code changes.
message:
Code changes.

The app now directly sends timestamps to the central device. Therefore,
the Smartphone clock is synchronized.

title: Added a .gitignore file to prevent access on Keys.
message: Added a .gitignore file to prevent access on Keys.

title: Changes at layout and usage.
message:
Changes at layout and usage.

Improved layout with icons and fixed some issues with the usage of the
app.

title: Uploaded to Google Play.
message:
Uploaded to Google Play.

This is the final version of the App as used at the regional competition
of "Jugend forscht". It includes many Layout improvements and bugfixes.
Also, the first APK uploaded to Google Play is included.

title: Bugfixes and Layout improvements
message:
Bugfixes and Layout improvements

Fixed a mayor bug causing the app being unable to connect to the main
program. The reason was that the ping command fails without any reason.
Also changed the Activities' Layout. Now all Layouts are children of a
ScrollView so you can scroll through the screen on too small devices.
Also added a reload button at most Activities.

title: Upload of the compileable version of the App.
message:
Upload of the compileable version of the App.

Upload of the App in its real version that can also be compiled.

title: Sourcecode of the App.
message:
Sourcecode of the App.

Please create "app" subfolder and move it there.
